name: Art Software
aboutMore:
Personal instance for a selected group of people.
Rules

Use CW. They are not censorship, but more like the subject of your post¬†;¬†you can put trigger warnings in it (example: emoji post for posts containing lots of emojis, which are not easily readable with a screen reader)
Avoid useless noise on public timelines. You can use different visibilities for that purpose. Answers to messages can and should generally be put in 'unlisted', to avoid clogging the public timeline with a given thread (it'll still appear in your follower's home though)
Describe the images you post, when and if you can. Try to think about people that could read them if they cannot see the picture.
Activate the sensitive warning (the eye) if the image might trigger other people (gore, nudity, etc)
Generally, try to think about the people reading your posts. You're not screaming at a void¬†; you are talking with real persons and your messages
will
have an impact on them. You should not act as an asshole and just throw shit at people under the excuse that ¬´¬†they should be less fussy¬†¬ª.

Rules
Pretty straightforward: don't be a dick, mostly. No racist, sexist, homophobic, or transphobic content. No harassing people (obviously). Adult content is permitted, but put it under a CW if it's explicit.
Adult content featuring minors isn't allowed, fictional or otherwise.

name: Necropolis Online
aboutMore:
Rules and Guideline
We do not accept:

Hate Speech, including but not restrained to: queerphobia, transphobia, racism, ableism, slurs, etc.
Illegal content, such as child pornography (including furry cub art) even if only suggestive
Harassment
Doxing
Any instances which does not follow similar rules

Guideline

Salut, bienvenue chez moi ! Vous pouvez m'appeler Renn, je poss√®de cette instance que j'utilise √† des fins purement personnelles. Si vous souhaitez rejoindre le F√©diverse, essayez une des instances list√©es
ici
!
Je suspendrai sans h√©siter toutes les instances ou les comptes qui diffusent ou tol√®rent, entres autres : racisme, anti-s√©mitisme, LGBTIphobies, sexisme, validisme, id√©ologie d'extr√™me-droite, p√©dophilie, zoophilie... Et je vous pr√©viens, ma limite de patience est assez basse pour ces choses l√†. De m√™me je silencerai les instances ou les comptes qui ne mettent pas d'avertissement de contenu sur leurs m√©dias pour le contenu NSFW.
Note : si vous estimez avoir une bonne raison de suspendre ou silencer cette instance ou mon compte, merci de me contacter par message priv√© afin que nous puissions trouver une solution. Si j'ai dit ou fait quelque chose d'inappropri√©, je pr√©f√®re √™tre au courant pour ne pas recommencer plut√¥t que d'√™tre bloqu√© du F√©diverse. J'essaye au mieux d'√™tre un √™tre humain d√©cent, mais √ßa peut m'arriver de dire ou de faire du mal sans le vouloir, comme tout √† chacun.
[EN] Welcome to my place!
Hi, this is my personal space! Please call me Renn, I own this instance that I use solely for personal purposes. If you wish to join the Fediverse, please check out one of the servers listed
there
!
I will suspend without hesitation any instance or account that diffuses or tolerates, among others: racism, antisemitism, LGBTIphobia, sexism, ableism, alt-right ideologies, pedophilia, zoophilia... Be warned, my threshold is quite low for this sort of thing. Moreover, I will silence any instance or account that doesn't put a content warning on NSFW media.
N.B. : if you think you have a good reason to suspend or silence this instance or my account, please contact me with a direct message, so that we can find a solution. If I said or did something inappropriate, I would rather be informed so that I don't do it again, instead of getting blocked from the Fediverse. I try to be a decent human being, but sometimes I say or do bad things without wanting to, as everyone does.

name: Jxm Social
aboutMore:
Jxm social Rules
The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration / moderation team of jxmsocial.xyz; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:
Jxm Social has a 3 level rule policy, level 1 = post removed from public timeline, level 2 = you recving a strike on you account, if you receve 3 strikes your account, your account will be permanently suspendid, level 3 = your account being being immediately permanently suspended:
Level 1 Rules

Advertising, even with a CW (Content Warning)
Post that need to have a CW (Content Warning) on them but don't, see
CW's (Content Warnings)

Level 2 Rules
And some more info about strikes, 1st rule violation = a warning from an admin or mod, 2nd rule violation = a message from an admin or mod, your account being disabled for 3 days, and you receving your 1st strike, 3rd rule violation = a message from an admin or mod, your account being disabled for 7 days, and you receving your 2nd strike, 4th rule violation = you receving your 3rd strike, and your account being immediately permanently suspendid

Racism or advocation of racism
Sexism or advocation of sexism
Discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin
Sexual depictions of children
Holocaust denialism, Nazi symbolism
Xenophobic
Porn / pornographic content, even with a CW (Content Warning)
Posting of illegal content
Posting of copyrighted work without the copyright holders permission, memes are permitted
Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health
repedidly posting stuff that needs to have a CW (Content Warning) with out one, see
CW's (Content Warnings)
for more info
And lastly harassment, see
Harassment
for more info

Level 3 Rules

Sexual depictions of children
Accounts impersonating others. Note this rule does not necessarily apply to remote accounts
Making alt accounts, if we have sufficient evidence suggesting that an account on this server is an alternate for someone who was banned / suspended from this server, then it will be immediately permanently suspended

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of jxmsocial.xyz reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law
Cross-posting
"Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another. That definition does
not
include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app, such as Twidere or PostyBirb. If you use those apps, we consider those posts original, and the following need not apply.
Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is fully permitted.
Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms:

The posts do not include platform-specific references, e.g. talking about "here" meaning Twitter, or including text from other non-Mastodon users verbatim (e.g. cross-posted quote tweets)
The account is at least semi-regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored
The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted

CW's (Content Warnings)
As stated
above
CW's (Content Warnings) are required on certain types of content below is a list of content requiring a CW (Content Warning) along with some example CW's (Content Warnings)

Political post, EX: CW's (Content Warnings), Politics for generl poltics or, USPol / EUPol / ASIAPol, for county / regain spacific politics
Religious post, EX: CW's (Content Warning), Religion / religous content
Mental heath post, EX: CW's (Content Warnings), MH
Graphic gore/violence weather it's IRL (In Real Life) in a video game or an artistic depiction, EX: CW's (Content Warnings), Graphic content / Contains graphic content / Viewer dicresion advised / NSFW (Not Safe For Work)
Post containing Spoilers, EX: CW's (Content Warnings), spoiler, Contains spoilers, and name of the content EX: Avatar the last airbender book 1 water - epasode 3
Post talking about Facebook, Instagram, twitter, pinterest, and other social media platforms, post talking about mastodon do not need a CW (Content Warning) unless the post contains content that warrents a CW (Content Warning), EX: FB for facebook, IG for instagram,And Birdsite for twitter.
Post containing an advertisment, the following is conciderd advertising and must have an apropriet CW (Content Warning) on it, sponserd post / the ones someone paid you to make, post talking about a product or serviece you yourself are selling, EX: CW's (Content Warnings), Sponserd, #Sponserd, Sponserd content, Advertising, Paid advertising, Self advertising

Harassment
Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is disallowed, and subject to punishment, see
Level 2 rules
for more info. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed
Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment
Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment

Team
In addition to the server owner,
@jxm_productions
, The admin / moderation team at Jxm social includes:

@jxm_social
witch is
@jxm_productions
alt account

Funding
This server is paid for by
@jxm_productions
Some Additional info
Jxm social is hosted by
mastohost
@mastohost@mastodon.social

aboutMore:
Fediverse-Friendly Moderation Covenant
This instance commits to the following
1. Administration and Moderation will be handled as neutral as possible
Reports and widespread information on specific instances (often known as
bad actors
) will be verified
and actions might be taken as necessary.
2. Actions taken will respond to the bare minimum to keep the network operating and not influence the ability of the instances users to connect to other people

If another instance spreads media content of questionable legality for the region the current instance
is operating from, these
files might be rejected
from being saved.
If another instance is sharing hateful messages that impact local users, there might be consideration
of
silencing
that specific instance from being visible in timelines. If users follow and/or wish to follow
users on the target instance, they are still free to do so.
If another instance is posting content illegal in the local instance operation region or actively posts content
attacking local users, a full
instance block
might be the last resort.

3. Communication before Actions
If any of the above behaviours start to surface from a given instance, the moderation of the local instance will attempt
to inform the moderation/administration of that instance and resolve the problems coming from there. Only if no communication succeeded or no results that resolved issues came forth, actions will be taken towards that instance.
4. We won't recommend blocks
Blocklists and block recommendations as an information source are taken for granted but lack accurate verification. Instead of using these options to publicly announce instances of questionable intent, we will inform local users of such, with the reminder of possible personal options for hiding content that might impact their experience of the network.
5. No Guilt-by-Association/Federation
If we have applied any action against Instance X, an Instance Y that federates with them will not get the same judgement applied to them. A natural connection, as by the networks design, does not imply shared interests and thus doesn't warrant the same moderation methods.

Regardless of all given points above, in special cases the instance moderation/administration might still opt to block
an instance, while this is tried to be avoided at most.

This Covenant is based on
The Fediverse-Friendly Moderation Covenant

name: Mootech
aboutMore:
Mootech is supposed to be a home for soft friends. Please let us know if you
want to join and read the rules.

The most important rule here though. If you find something bad, you have a
few options:
block/mute the offending user
block/mute the offending user's instance
report the offending user
Never resort to harassment yourself. We have tools here, so use them!
The mooderators and admins are here to protect our community. We will listen to
you and take actions accordingly, even if that means to cut out other
people.
Protection of this community has the highest priority.
Creative people on this instance
These are not all people, doing creative things, here!

about games (

this is a private mastodon node run in canada. despite the theme of degeneracy, we're a pretty decent bunch. because this node is private we really don't have... rules, but in case anyone was wondering i do trust the people on this instance as far as:

nsfw is allowed, tag it though

name: social.tchncs.de

table.Reason: Media-block due to in germany illegal media
Media-block due to in germany illegal media
nazi propaganda, spread of misinformation and conspiracy theories
Suspicious or harmful administration activity / considered lawless
appears to be 100% rss bots ... and a ton.
Suspicious or harmful administration activity / considered lawless

aboutMore:
Above statistics are specific to this server.

This instance uses and recommends the Mastomojies by
@seppini
.
You can copy them in your admin panel or get them
here
.
Notice
Our terms don't yet reflect it for technical reasons but logfiles are now purged after 7 days!

Guidelines
On social.tchncs.de our primary directive is:
‚Üí "Be nice to each
        other!"
Please remember there are real people on the other side of the screen, and those people may have different feelings
    and opinions and experiences than you do. Some of them may be tired or having a bad day. Or you might.
You don't have to agree with someone to be civil to them. If you can't be civil to someone, leave them
    alone.
If you don't wish to interact with someone, or see any of their posts, there are tools at your disposal
    including mute and block functions.
If someone's posts make you angry or upset, take some time to calm down before you reply. You might also try
    simply excusing yourself from a conversation and ask them to untag you if you no longer wish to discuss a topic.

When someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone. If you feel like you can't control your urge to
    respond to that person, use the block or mute feature so you won't see their posts and be tempted.
Keep in mind that while you cannot control other people's behavior, you are still responsible for your own
    conduct, even if you feel someone was rude to you or someone else.
We will not allow abusive or disruptive conduct by or toward users on social.tchncs.de. This includes continuing to
    engage in conversation with someone who has specifically requested you leave them alone, inciting other users to
    engage with that person on your behalf, aggregating and posting another person's personal information without
    their consent, and inciting others to engage with that person on other platforms. Blocking someone and then sitting
    on the other side of a block and continuing to talk about that person is also a provoking behavior.
Before you post, think about whether this is the kind of thing you would like to see (or would like your mom or kids
    to see) in the public timeline. There are post visibility settings that give you some control over which timelines
    your post appears in, and also CW and NSFW buttons to hide specific text and images in your post. Be a good social
    media neighbor and use these functions when appropriate.

Content not allowed on social.tchncs.de

Sexual depictions of children
Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
Content that is considered to be misinformation/conspiracy

Content which will be removed from the public timeline:

Excessive advertising
Untagged pornography- and sexually explicit content
Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence
We will also remove any content we judge to be hateful toward specific individuals or groups, or intended to
        cause or incite harm from the public timeline.

        This guideline is intentionally vague because we do not intend to play "rules lawyer" on the subject
        of what it is and isn't okay to say about people. A good rule of thumb is, if you're about to say
        something you think might fall foul of this rule, you probably shouldn't say it. ‚ò∫

Timeline Flooding
In order to keep the best user experience, we ask you not to send like twenty toots in two minutes (exemplification)
    as people want to be able to see more than just one user in their timelines.
Of course we understand and may do an exception for critical reasons of yours like a kind of serious emergency
    situation for example.

Reporting / Moderation Notes
If you see content which you believe is in breach of these rules, please report it for review,
it is very
    important for us, as it makes our work easier and this instance a more enjoyable place.
Please note however that repeately falsely reporting users is not welcomed and are treated as feature-abuse.
In case you broke our rules by mistake, we may try to reach out to you so please make sure not to block the team of
    social.tchncs.de.
These guidelines are not a legal document, they're here to provide you with an insight into
    our moderation policies. Final interpretation is up to the administration of social.tchncs.de and the
    administration reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except
    as limited by law.

Staff

@Cedara
(Moderator)

@Meldrian
(Moderator)

@Milan
(Site Owner)

Federation status
social.tchncs.de does not believe in censorship. Federation is a network service and suspension of federation with
    another server will only be implemented as a last resort where content from another server may cause problems under
    German law, or in cases of technical difficulties or hostile or malicious activity. If we need to suspend
    federation or silence another instance for one/some of these reasons, it will be noted here (now further below). Did we make a wrong
    decision in your opinion? Ping us!

(Note: you can still communicate with users on silenced instances; their posts will not appear in our public
    timelines. You will not be able to see posts made by users on suspended instances.)

Reporting an issue
For technical issues, use the administrator contact information listed under "Contact"
For content or abuse issues:

if you're a user on social.tchncs.de you can use the "Report Abuse" function on the post you
        would like to report;
If you're not a user on social.tchncs.de, or you're an administrator of another server who would like
        to discuss an abuse report you received about one of our users, please use the administrator email listed under
        "Contact"

For privacy reasons, we will not discuss abuse reports in public channels.

Funding
Our servers and related are
crowdfunded
and
    thereby made possible by our amazing community. üòç

Privacy
Please remember that nothing on the internet is really private and consider anything you say saved forever. Mastodon
    is not a secure channel for sensitive communication.
social.tchncs.de does not use advertising or external analytics software and does not sell your information.
(Instead you can help us by dropping a
small donation
.
    ‚ô° üòâ)

* Being a Dick is defined as doing, supporting, dogwhistling.etc any one or more of the following: Racism, Sexism, Transphobia, Homophobia, Islamophobia, Classism, Ableism, Kinphobia, or other forms of discrimination not listed here (i.e. this list is *not* exhaustive)
(And no, punching up isn't Being A Dick. Saying mean things about white people isn't Being A Dick.)
Inactivity Policy
Accounts which have not been logged into for a month or longer are eligible for suspension. At the 30 day mark, an email will be sent out asking if you wish to keep the account. If you do not reply within another 30 days, or reply that you do not wish to keep the account, the account will be suspended, to keep the user count of the server accurate. The suspension *can* be undone at any time, and email requests for undoing an account's suspension can be sent to admin@efdn.club or norikawa@efdn.club
Archival Policy
EFDN
explicitly
does not allow any archival of any user's account, posts or other data without the explicit consent of the user(s) being archived. This means that EFDN, as a whole, "opts out" to any archival, scraping or other data collection schemes, except for those users who specifically note otherwise. Essentially, if you don't see a note in someone's profile, they're opted out.
K-NAR

name: Rage.love
aboutMore:
The Rage
We have enough of all the systematic bias that destroy lives.
We had enough of the patriarchy.
We had enough of the colonialism and the racism.
We had enough of the capitalistic system.
No TERF, no SWERF, no Nazi, no Centrist

The Love
We care for each other
We care for the living
We care for the land
We remember who we lost and what they fought for

Rules and Etiquette
Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, if you do, know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. 
The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.
Be you
This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Here you don't need to be a brand, be true to yourself and let others do the same.
Cultivate a Safe Atmosphere
Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.
Share Things
Talk about what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Share you patreon! Post your art! Share your knowledge! ask the questions that keep you awake at night.
Banal Bullshit Unwelcome
There's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't an opinion, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you.
Enforced strictly.

Moderation
The current moderation is done by 4 (four) persons with varying amount of spoons. Allow 24 hours for answers, actions and replies .
To repport a toot, click the "3" dots menu and click report. It will allow you to select one or more toot. You'll also be able to add a note for the moderators to see.
We are looking for help to moderate this community, we would appreciate people from different background, life experience and geographies. We are currently pale and fairly euro-centric.
To do so and improve bias, we will favorite people that are not cis men, hetero, white, able, european. To apply send a DM to @kyzh@rage.love, the process is not formalised and might take a while.
Rage Dot Love will suspend any instance launched, acquired or funded by Alphabet, Facebook, Twitter, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon, Elsevier or similar corporation.
